title: Breathing Techniques
description: Master the breathing styles and their forms!

questions.question: Which breathing style is considered the original from which all others derive?
questions.explanation: Sun Breathing (Hinokami Kagura) was created by Yoriichi Tsugikuni and is the original style from which all others branched!

questions.question: Water Breathing has 11 forms, making it the style with the most techniques.
questions.explanation: Water Breathing has 10 forms plus one unique 11th form created by Giyu (Dead Calm). But Sun Breathing has 13 forms!

questions.question: What is the First Form of Thunder Breathing called?
questions.explanation: Thunderclap and Flash is the only form Zenitsu mastered, but he perfected it to an incredible level with multiple variations!

questions.question: Which breathing style did Mitsuri Kanroji derive her Love Breathing from?
questions.explanation: Love Breathing is derived from Flame Breathing. Mitsuri trained under Rengoku before developing her own style!

questions.question: Serpent Breathing is derived from Water Breathing.
questions.explanation: Serpent Breathing, used by Obanai Iguro, is derived from Water Breathing with slithering, winding movements like a snake!

questions.question: What technique does Giyu Tomioka create himself?
questions.explanation: Dead Calm is Giyu's original technique where he stops all movement to deflect any incoming attack!

questions.question: How many forms does Stone Breathing have?
questions.explanation: Stone Breathing has 5 forms, used by Gyomei Himejima with his unique spiked flail and axe weapon!

questions.question: Beast Breathing was created by Inosuke without any formal training.
questions.explanation: Inosuke developed Beast Breathing entirely on his own while living in the mountains, making it a completely original style!
